title: What Is the Future of Kanye West’s Music?
description: As corporate partners cut ties with the artist now known as Ye following weeks of antisemitic statements, many wonder if the recording catalog that was his bedrock will withstand the backlash.
dc:creator: Joe Coscarelli and Ben Sisario
media:description: While Ye once dominated the pop world with inescapable songs like “Jesus Walks,” “Gold Digger” and “Stronger,” he has not had a major hit in years.
